author: Kimmy Yam
title: House members introduce resolution to pin coronavirus blame on China
description: Legislation spearheaded by Republican Jim Banks and Democrat Seth Moulton accuses China of making mistakes in handling the coronavirus, downplaying its risks and censorship.
content:
House members introduced a resolution Tuesday that would condemn China for its handling of the COVID-19 pandemic.
The legislation, spearheaded by Reps. Jim Banks, R-Ind., and Seth Moulton, D-Mass., accuses the Chinese government of having made multiple "seri… [+4378 chars]
